int main()
{
	int number;
	int abs_number;

	cout << "This program finds the absolute value of an integer." << endl;
	cout << "Enter an integer (positive or negative): ";
	cin >> number;
	
	if(number >= 0)
	{
		abs_number = number;
	}
	else
		abs_number = -number;
	
	cout << "The absolute value of " << number << " is " << abs_number;
	cout << endl;
	return 0;

}
